events.name: Getting Started with Drones by Syab Phang
events.description:
When you hear the word "drone," you probably think of a flying gadget.
 
In this session, we will have Syab Phang to share with us on how she got started with drones after a friend of hers introduced her to the maker community in Singapore through Repair Kopitiam by Sustainable Living Lab. She was helping out at Maker Faire last year and noticed that there were a lot of booths showcasing the drones that were built. After Maker Faire, there was an open call for applications to OneMaker Groupâ€™s Apprenticeship Programme and it was then that she decided to jump into the Drone bandwagon and used that opportunity try and build a drone from scratch.
 
Participants will get to know more about drones from Syab's perspective and how you can get start making your own drone!
 
There will also be a Q&A session after the talk.

Register Here
